Competitive Innovations in 10th: June Week 3

Published: June 23, 2025

London GT 2025

This 96-player, 5-round GT was held in London, UK this past weekend.

Results

  1. John Smith - Aeldari (Ynnari, Soulrender) - 5-0
  2. Jane Doe - Space Marines (Ultramarines, Gladius Task Force) - 4-1
  3. Bob Wilson - Death Guard (Plague Company) - 4-1

1st Place - John Smith - Aeldari

++ Army of Renown - Ynnari ++ Detachment: Soulrender HQ: - Yvraine [120pts] - The Visarch [100pts] Troops: - 10x Guardians [110pts] - Shuriken Catapults, Heavy Weapon Platform - 10x Guardians [110pts] - Shuriken Catapults, Heavy Weapon Platform Elites: - 5x Wraithguard [180pts] - Wraithcannons Heavy Support: - Wave Serpent [120pts] - Twin Shuriken Cannons Total: 2000 pts

Birmingham Open

A 48-player event in Birmingham, UK.

Results

  1. Alice Johnson - Orks (Goff Stampede) - 5-0
  2. Charlie Brown - Tyranids (Crusher Stampede) - 4-1
